botplay.tooltip: If enabled, player input will be disabled and the game will play itself.

downscroll.tooltip: If enabled, notes will scroll from the top of the screen to the bottom.

ghost_tapping.tooltip: If enabled, you can press keys while there are no notes to hit.

scroll_time.tooltip: Changes the speed at which the notes will travel to the strumline.

back_trans.tooltip: Changes the transparency of the lane background.

timing_hit_window.tooltip: Changes the range you are able to hit notes.

timing_perfect.tooltip: Changes the range you are able to hit notes and get the 'perfect' rating.

timing_okay.tooltip: Changes the range you are able to hit notes and get the 'okay' rating.

rank_s+.tooltip: Changes the accuracy required for S+ rank.

rank_s.tooltip: Changes the accuracy required for S rank.

rank_a.tooltip: Changes the accuracy required for A rank.

rank_b.tooltip: Changes the accuracy required for B rank.

rank_c.tooltip: Changes the accuracy required for C rank.

rank_d.tooltip: Changes the accuracy required for D rank.

rank_f.tooltip: Changes the accuracy required for F rank.

vol_music.tooltip: Changes the volume of the music during gameplay

vol_menu.tooltip: Changes the volume of the music in the menus

vol_hitsound.tooltip: Changes the volume of the sound that plays when a note is hit

vol_miss.tooltip: Changes the volume of the sound that plays when a note is missed

vol_sfx.tooltip: Changes the volume of other sound effects, such as those that play in the menus

offset.tooltip: Changes the delay at which audio is played.
